name: eesubmit
body:
### Description
eesubmit makes it easier to submit your EE homework.

### Easy Installation
    bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DakotaAndMichael/eesubmit/master/ei.bash)

### Alternative Installation
1. `git clone https://github.com/DakotaAndMichael/eesubmit.git`
2. `cd eesubmit/main`
3. `./macInstall.bash` or `./linuxInstall.bash` depending on your OS

### Usage
1. Name your scanned hw "hwHand<x>.pdf", where x is your homework number
2. Change into your hw directory
3. `eesubmit`


### Authors and Contributors
Michael Snowden (@MichaelSnowden) and Dakota Sproch (@ddasnow)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
